TraitDef.label: Imperial Discipline
TraitDef.description: This pawn embodies the disciplined nature of Imperial culture, with enhanced social skills, construction ability, and mental resilience inherited from generations of Imperial civilization.

li.label: Disciplined
li.description: Raised in the Imperial tradition of order and civilization, this pawn excels at social interaction, construction, and maintains mental fortitude.

TraitDef.label: Colovian Heritage
TraitDef.description: This pawn descends from the hardy Colovian highlands, inheriting their reputation for military prowess, craftsmanship, and practical skills.

li.label: Colovian
li.description: From the western highlands of Cyrodiil, this pawn possesses enhanced combat skills and crafting abilities typical of Colovian stock.

TraitDef.label: Nibenese Heritage
TraitDef.description: This pawn carries the sophisticated bloodline of the Nibenese, known for their magical aptitude, mercantile skills, and cultural refinement.

li.label: Nibenese
li.description: From the eastern heartlands of Cyrodiil, this pawn exhibits the Nibenese talents for magic, trade, and artistic pursuits.

TraitDef.label: Legion Veteran
TraitDef.description: This pawn served with distinction in the Imperial Legion, gaining combat experience and tactical knowledge that serves them well in any conflict.

li.label: Veteran
li.description: Years of service in the disciplined ranks of the Imperial Legion have honed this pawn's combat abilities and leadership skills.

TraitDef.label: Imperial Noble
TraitDef.description: This pawn was born into Imperial nobility, receiving the finest education and social training but perhaps lacking in practical labor skills.

li.label: Noble
li.description: Raised in Imperial high society, this pawn excels in social situations and intellectual pursuits but may struggle with manual labor.
